scripts.build: npm run build:scss && npm run build:admin && npm run build:js
scripts.build:scss: sass sass/ponyfill.scss assets/ponyfill.css --style=expanded --load-path ../node_modules && postcss assets/ponyfill.css --use autoprefixer postcss-custom-media --output assets/ponyfill.css --map
scripts.build:admin: sass sass/admin.scss assets/admin.css --style=expanded --load-path ../node_modules && postcss assets/admin.css --use autoprefixer postcss-custom-media --output assets/admin.css --map
